gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Entire OS froze completely a few second after the initial logo of the game appeared. Couldn't get out of it in anyway other than forcefully shutting down the machine. I'm on a laptop, so I also tried with optirun (GTX 960M; driver 396.54), same thing.
title: Fuel Renegades
